Submitter Information: Jiangsu Micsafe Medical Technology Co., Ltd
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Jiangsu Micsafe single-use blood collection needles, sets, and holders (with/without safety shield) for venous blood specimen collection
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for multiple collections of venous blood using vacuum blood collection tubes; safety versions include shield for protection against accidental needle stick injury
